description:
This winterized variant of the Speedgoat 5 GTX has undergone enhancements to improve traction in icy conditions. The compression-molded EVA midsole is lighter and more durable than the previous version, providing firm yet floating cushioning and support. Snow and ice doesn’t stop your trail running season, they just make it a little more interesting.

  • Double-layer recycled mesh upper is highly breathable
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof membrane keeps your feet dry from below
  • Toe cap adds durability and provides protection against trail bumps
  • Oversize EVA midsole provides lightweight cushioning and a floaty feel
  • Late stage MetaRocker™ geometry supports your natural running form, and encourages an efficient, smooth roll from initial impact to toe-off
  • Wide platform provides a stable base on varied terrain
  • Multi-directional 5mm Vibram® MegaGrip lugs grip whatever surface you encounter
  • 12 tungsten carbide spikes strategically crafted to ensure stability and prevent slips
name: Hoka One One Speedgoat 5 Gore-Tex Spike Trail Running Shoes - Men's
